verses.name: Matthew 12:17
verses.text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying,

verses.name: Matthew 12:18
verses.text: Behold my servant, whom I have chosen; my beloved, in whom my soul is well pleased: I will put my spirit upon him, and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles.

verses.name: Matthew 12:19
verses.text: He shall not strive, nor cry; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets.

verses.name: Matthew 12:20
verses.text: A bruised reed shall he not break, and smoking flax shall he not quench, till he send forth judgment unto victory.

verses.name: Matthew 12:21
verses.text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust.
